name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Orca SEO - Your All-in-One SEO Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize your website with Orca SEO. Analyze SEO, check broken links, preview SERPs, and simulate rankings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your website's performance with Orca SEO, a powerful and user-friendly Chrome SEO extension designed to streamline your SEO efforts. With Orca SEO, you can easily analyze on-page SEO elements, check for broken links, preview SERP results, and simulate search rankings from multiple locations. Whether you're a seasoned SEO professional or just starting, Orca SEO offers a comprehensive suite of tools to enhance your site's visibility and search engine ranking. Features include:

Key Features:

Content Analysis:
Language Detection: Automatically identifies the language of your content for targeted optimization.
Word Count: Accurately measures the word count of your content.
Head Title: Analyzes your page titles for adherence to SEO best practices.
Meta Description: Reviews and optimizes your meta descriptions to improve click-through rates.
Canonical URL: Ensures URLs are properly canonicalized to prevent duplicate content issues.
Robots.txt Settings: Checks and optimizes your robots.txt file for effective search engine crawling.
H1 Tags: Inspects your H1 tags for SEO best practices.
Heading Tags: Identifies and evaluates all heading tags (H1, H2, H3, etc.) for proper hierarchy and SEO, with a new feature to export all headings directly to CSV for easy analysis.
Export all headings from your website directly to CSV, making it easier than ever to analyze and organize your content structure for optimal SEO performance!

On-Page Link Analysis Tool:
Export and Highlight Links: Highlights and exports all links on your page.
External Links: Identifies and assesses external links.
Internal Links: Analyzes and improves your internal linking structure.
No-Follow Links: Detects no-follow links for better link management.
Total Links: Provides a comprehensive count of all links on your page.

SEO Image Attribute Analyzer:
Alt Text Missing: Identifies images missing alt text to improve accessibility.
Title Attributes Missing: Detects images lacking title attributes.
Export Images: Exports a list of all images on your page for easier management.

On-Page SEO Technical Audit:
Copy Schema Markup: Enables quick implementation by copying schema markup.
Social:
OpenGraph Tags: Analyzes OpenGraph tags for enhanced social media sharing.
Options:
Sitemap Finder: Locates and reviews your sitemap to ensure proper indexation.

SERP Analysis:
Rankings Overview: Provides a quick overview of your position on the search results page.
Ad Labeling: Labels search results in both Google and Bing to identify ads.
Local Search Simulation: Search locally in top locations, including the US, UK, and Canada.
NEW! Search localy with ChatGPT: Gain AI-powered insights with ChatGPT to assist with content strategy, keyword ideas, and competitor analysis.

View Site In:
SEMRUSH: Leverages SEMRUSH for detailed SEO insights and analysis.
Ahrefs: Accesses comprehensive backlink and SEO data through Ahrefs.
And More: Offers additional tools for a complete and thorough SEO audit.

What's New?
NEW! Search localy with ChatGPT: Gain AI-powered insights with ChatGPT to assist with content strategy, keyword ideas, and competitor analysis.
Now includes an intuitive SEO Traffic Light system that automatically analyzes web pages and displays instant visual feedback:
